sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SpotifyService } from '../services/spotify.service'; import { AlbumResponse } from '../interfaces/Spotify/Search/AlbumResponse'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.css'], }) export class SearchComponent { searchQuery: string = ''; searchType: string = 'artist'; searchResults: AlbumResponse[] = []; currentPage: number = 1; itemsPerPage: number = 9; constructor(private spotifyService: SpotifyService) {} search(): void { switch (this.searchType) { case 'artist': this.searchArtist(); break; case 'album': this.searchAlbum(); break; default: break; } } searchArtist() { this.searchResults = []; try { this.spotifyService.searchAlbum(this.searchQuery).subscribe({ error: (response) => { console.log('Search failed: ' + response.message); }, next: (response: any) => { this.searchResults = response.albums.items; console.log(this.searchResults); }, }); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } searchAlbum(): void { this.searchResults = []; try { this.spotifyService.searchAlbum(this.searchQuery).subscribe({ error: (response) => { console.log('Search failed: ' + response.message); }, next: (response: any) => { this.searchResults = response.albums.items; console.log(this.searchResults); }, }); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } get totalPages(): number[] { const total = Math.ceil(this.searchResults.length / this.itemsPerPage); return Array(total) .fill(0) .map((_, index) => index + 1); } setCurrentPage(page: number): void { if (page >= 1 && page <= this.totalPages.length) { this.currentPage = page; } } getIterable(value: any): any[] { return Array.isArray(value) ? value : Array.from({ length: value }); } }
